org.apache.dvsl.dom4j
Class Dom4jNodeImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.dvsl.dom4j.Dom4jNodeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DVSLNode
public class Dom4jNodeImpl
extends Object
implements DVSLNode

wrapper class for dom4j nodes to implement the DVSLNode interface for template use

Author:
Geir Magnusson Jr.
